IntroductionText: Private Meet is a lightweight, secure space for instant private meetings. Create a user, generate a room, and connect â€” no friction, no noise.

Errors.RoomIDIsTooLong: Room ID is too long (maximum is {{maxRoomIDLength}} characters).
Errors.WebRTCNotFullyConnectedWithAllPeers: WebRTC is not fully connected with all peers.
Errors.RefusingToCreatePeerConnToSelf: Refusing to create peer connection to self.
Errors.UseWebRTCMeshFailedToGetUserMediaAudioWh: [useWebRTCMesh] Failed to getUserMedia(audio) while creating peer.
Errors.NotConnectedYetTryAgainInASecond: Not connected yet. Try again in a second.
Errors.NoOneInTheRoomToReceiveMessage: No one else is in the room to receive your message.
Errors.NoOneInTheRoomToSendFile: No one else is in the room to send your file.
Errors.ImageSendingIsOnlyAllowedAfterWebRTCIsCo: Image sending is only available after WebRTC is connected with everyone in the room.
Errors.OnlyImagesAreSupportedForNow: Only images are supported for now.
Errors.FailedToSendImageOverWebRTC: Failed to send image over WebRTC.
Errors.ConnectingDotDotDotTryAgainInAMoment: Connecting... Try again in a moment.

NotFound.PageNotFoundMessage: The page you are looking for does not exist.

Infos.UserDeletedSuccessfully: User deleted. Please create a new user to continue.

JoinMeeting.PText1: Max length: {{maxRoomIDLength}} characters. Both Room ID and Passphrase.
JoinMeeting.PText2: The passphrase is used to encrypt your messages end-to-end. If you leave it blank, the room id will be used as the passphrase. It's really recommended to use a passphrase for better security. All the users in the room must use the same passphrase to communicate securely, otherwise they won't be able to read each other's messages.

Chat.TurnOnCameraOrShareScreen: Turn on camera or share screen to start video.
Chat.MsgsAreSentViaWsE2EEEncryption: Messages are sent via WebSocket. End-to-end encrypted.
